import React from 'react'; import './Footer.css'; import { Button } from './Button'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' function Footer() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm('service_bwyxkaa', 'template_ywp2pd4', form.current, { publicKey: 'ZsMgOetuKn62a8c8a', }) .then( () => { console.log('SUCCESS!'); }, (error) => { console.log('FAILED...', error.text); }, ); }; return (
